item.title: Microsoft Purview powering data security and compliance for Security Copilot
item.description: Microsoft Purview provides Security and Compliance teams with extensive visibility into admin actions within Security Copilot. It offers tools for enriched users and data insights to identify, review, and manage Security Copilot interaction data in DSPM for AI. Data security and compliance administrators can also utilize Purview’s capabilities for data lifecycle management and information protection, advanced retention, eDiscovery, and more.
